infoSection.title: Understanding TruthLens
infoSection.description: TruthLens is an AI-powered investigative toolkit designed to help you critically evaluate the credibility of texts, images, and narratives. It combines advanced NLP, forensic image analysis, and multilingual translation to empower your reasoning in a world shaped by manipulated content.

textAnalysis.title: Text Analysis
textAnalysis.subtitle: Critical Language Examination of Articles and Excerpts
textAnalysis.description: Paste any article or passage (up to 8,000 characters) and TruthLens will generate a structured analytical report powered by LLM reasoning, custom heuristics, and discourse-aware prompt engineering.
features: Fake News Probability (%): Estimated based on speculative language patterns, hedging verbs, and factual density scoring.
Political Bias Detection: Analyzes ideological leaning using sentiment analysis toward political actors, linguistic framing, and alignment with known topics or agendas.
Emotional Tone Classification: Classifies the overall tone of the article as neutral, alarmist, or persuasive using hybrid lexicon-contextual models.
Reader Recommendation Engine: Suggests how to approach the article (e.g. verify, cross-check, or dismiss) based on a weighted aggregation of bias and tone metrics.
Narrative Style Classification: Segments the article using a zero-shot classifier into:

Psychological Emotion Mapping: Detects core emotions such as anger, fear, joy, sadness, disgust, trust, anticipation, and surprise. Based on Plutchik's emotion wheel and transformer-based tagging, this analysis reveals the emotional undertones driving the narrative.

contentAnalysis.title: Content & Framing Analysis (DOCA-Based)
contentAnalysis.description: TruthLens integrates a DOCA-inspired model—Discourse, Objectivity, Certainty, and Affect—to go beyond surface-level text classification.
features: Topic Detection: Identifies the main theme of the article (e.g., politics, economics, security).

imageAnalysis.title: Image Analysis
imageAnalysis.subtitle: AI-Generated Image Detection via Forensic Techniques
imageAnalysis.description: Upload any image to evaluate whether it may have been generated or manipulated by AI.
features: Visual Artifact Detection: Identifies visual anomalies such as warped text, unnatural symmetry, inconsistent lighting, or skin texture irregularities.
Spectral Analysis (FFT): Applies Fast Fourier Transform to detect frequency-domain distortions typically found in synthetic media.
EXIF Metadata Inspection: Parses embedded metadata to detect missing fields, camera inconsistencies, or traces of AI rendering.
